summary: Danny, an ambitious singing and dancing cat, goes to Hollywood and overcomes several obstacles to fulfill his dream of becoming a movie star.
cast: Scott Bakula|Jasmine Guy|Natalie Cole|Ashley Peldon|Lindsay Ridgeway|Kathy Najimy|John Rhys-Davies|George Kennedy|Rene Auberjonois|Betty Lou Gerson|Hal Holbrook|Matthew Herried|Don Knotts|Rick Logan|Frank Welker|David Johansen|Mark Dindal|Vanessa Theme Ament|Dee Bradley Baker|Catherine Battistone|Bob Bergen|Shelby Daniel|Debi Derryberry|Bill Farmer|Barbara Goodson|Patty Lund|Mona Marshall|Gary Matanky|Patricia Parris|Tony Pope|Peter Renaday|Doug Stone|David W. Thompson|Torri Whitehead|Michelle Lynskey
title: Los gatos no bailan
